name: Empowered Paragon Plate
description: This item does 35% more damage to all monsters and gives 25% more gold/exp/rep/cp when equipped. This armor is riddled with the faces of it's last victims. If you listen closely, you can still hear their cries of those slain in the Dage vs Nulgath war. Now that Nulgath has left the Underworld to Dage, what will the Evil One do?
